CustomField.formula: IF(INCLUDES( Worker_will_require__c , "Android"), "Android" + "," , NULL) + IF(INCLUDES( Worker_will_require__c , "Blackberry"), "Blackberry" + "," , NULL) + IF(INCLUDES( Worker_will_require__c , "iPhone"), "iPhone" + "," , NULL) + IF(INCLUDES( Worker_will_require__c , "Windows"), "Windows" + "," , NULL) + IF(INCLUDES( Worker_will_require__c , "International Dialing"), "International Dialing" + "," , NULL) + IF(INCLUDES( Worker_will_require__c , "International Data Roaming"), "International Data Roaming" + "," , NULL)
CustomField.label: Wireless Device Compilation
